column4: Hi everyone. I'm curious, when I have two network adapters, how can I bind apps like firefox, ping, and traceroute to the first one? I *only* want to use a certain application on the second interface.
Read the manual pages for each application using "man ping" as an example. "ping -I <interface>"
Oh, so there's no system setting that can direct all traffic to one interface globally?
There probably is - I have never done it that way, I just specify a bind IP when configuring each application.
And I can't answer you with what that "probably is" actually is. :-)
Alright, well thank you anyways :) I'm just trying to setup LTSP, and although I'd preferably like to set it up on only one NIC, I can't figure out how to reconfigure it.
